title: The Supreme of Milky Way - Novel Updates
author: 雨暮浮屠
description: “This is the era of science and technology, and it's also my time!” If the feet reach, the stars will tremble! When the space for arms stretch, the time will be destroyed! With the backing of the backbone, the people of all ethnic groups must Surrender! In the direction of the fists waving, the universe must be shattered! The fairy demon inherits, the body lords it, and it breaks the world. It reads out the power to cross the universe and suppress the people! Dump everything and crush everything, creating the most powerful universe body!...>
